word_json: {"wordRank":1,"headWord":"cancel","content":{"word":{"wordHead":"cancel","wordId":"ChuZhong_3_1","content":{"sentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"Our flight was cancelled.","sCn":"我们的航班取消了。"},{"sContent":"I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.","sCn":"恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。"},{"sContent":"You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.","sCn":"你只能打电话给约翰取消了。"}],"desc":"例句"},"usphone":"'kænsl","syno":{"synos":[{"pos":"vt","tran":"[计]取消；删去","hwds":[{"w":"recall"},{"w":"call it off"}]},{"pos":"vi","tran":"[计]取消；相互抵销","hwds":[{"w":"call it off"},{"w":"declare off"}]},{"pos":"n","tran":"[计]取消，撤销","hwds":[{"w":"withdrawal"},{"w":"revocation"}]}],"desc":"同近"},"ukphone":"'kænsl","ukspeech":"cancel&type=1","phrase":{"phrases":[{"pContent":"cancel button","pCn":"取消按钮"},{"pContent":"cancel out","pCn":"取消；抵销"},{"pContent":"cancel after verification","pCn":"核销"}],"desc":"短语"},"remMethod":{"val":" 患了癌症(cancer)， 取消(cancel)行程","desc":"记忆"},"relWord":{"rels":[{"pos":"n","words":[{"hwd":"cancellation","tran":" 取消；删除"}]}],"desc":"同根"},"usspeech":"cancel&type=2","trans":[{"tranCn":" 取消， 废除； 抵消； 删去， 划掉","descOther":"英释","pos":"v","descCn":"中释","tranOther":"to decide that something that was officially planned will not happen"}]}}},"bookId":"ChuZhong_3"}
